title: MD
biography: Panayiotis Michael Zavos, or Panos Zavos, is a physiologist who was born in Cyprus and later emigrated to the United States. Zavos has been the subject of controversy for making unsubstantiated claims that he can clone human beings.
aiSummary: Panayiotis Zavos is a reproductive medicine specialist with an H-index of 20 at Kentucky Center for Reproductive Medicine (Member). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
